newsitem.title: ETHIOPIA: ETHIOPIAN SOCCER PLAYERS DISAPPEAR IN ROME, RADIO.
newsitem.headline: ETHIOPIAN SOCCER PLAYERS DISAPPEAR IN ROME, RADIO.

text.p: Most of Ethiopia's national soccer squad have disappeared in Rome while on their way to Morocco for an African National Cup match, state radio reported on Tuesday.
The radio said the team leader had requested permission to return home with the remaining players, because he believed the match against the Moroccans was impossible under the circumstances.
The radio did not specify how many of the 23-man squad went missing during the 16-hour Rome stopover
The Horn of Africa nation was briefly an Italian colony.
